item.description:
Last night was so much fun, lets do it again. I had a great time meeting everyone.
The fee is $18 which includes a target of four people per lane, space to hang, bowling unlimited strings and the PayPal fee.  Shoes are $4.20 per person if you want to bowl.
We will do our best to keep it to four people per lane for more bowling time.
Each person can choose to order food, and pay individually, that will be delivered to the lanes.

To reserve the lanes, I will need a commitment of people going.  Please make your reservation so that I can confirm the lanes.

 

NOTE: YOU MUST BE A PAID UP MEMBER TO ATTEND. If you haven't paid the $10 group fee for the first half of 2013 DO NOT RSVP. NO refunds for non-members.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Barbara at Bowling check in desk

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Dinner or Snacks, Drinks and Bowling
